short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces words that are usually associated with terror to words that are less terrifying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You won't be taking terrorists too seriously with this extension installed.

Replaces words that are usually associated with terror to words that are less terrifying.
